text:
Dorothy L. Hukill (September 20, 1946 – October 2, 2018) was a Republican American politician. She was a member of the Florida Senate 2012 until her death in 2018. She also was in the Florida House of Representatives, representing the 28th district in southern Volusia from 2004 to 2012.
Hukill died under hospice care in Port Orange, Florida on October 2, 2018 from cervical cancer at the age of 72.
